'''Co'el Marcellus''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A traveler of Eora far and wide, Marcellus is a con artist who pretends to be an actor and a bard. His ''audiences'' sometimes don't appreciate his ''wit'' as much as they should, especially when he's going to great lengths to impersonate a foreign dignitary. Unfortunately, he has fallen on some hard times recently and is practically broke.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =[A Tidy Performance](/aTidyPerformance/)
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* You can find out he's broke with Insight 4. You can also pay him {{cp2|3000}} for +1 to Bluff and Streetwise.
}}
[Category:Dunnage characters](/categoryDunnageCharacters/)
